Name: Name
delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete the instance?
delete_ssh_key_text: Are you sure you want to delete your current SSH key? Doing so will prevent you from using it to authenticate to the server.
delete_warning: Files will be permanently lost. To delete an istance, you must type "Permanently delete".
resize_warning: Warning: instance resize will cause downtime. The instance will shutdown and the disk image will be copied to a new disk. This may take a while, depending on the disk size.
resize_notes: Notes: you can only select flavors larger than your current flavor. After the resize is completed, the instance will have the state "VERIFY RESIZE". Check if everything is ok with your data and then click on "Confirm resize" in the instance menu. If you select the “Revert Resize” option, the funds will not be returned to your balance, but if you try again to resize to the same tariff within 24 hours, the funds will not be withdrawn.
Name can have no more than: The name can have no more than 32 characters
This name is already in use: This name is already in use
Name cannot consist spaces: The name cannot consist of only spaces
Name can only contain: The name must contain only valid characters: Latin letters, numbers, spaces, dashes or underscores
pass_method_ssh: Connect to your instance using SSH key pair
pass_method_password: Connect to your instance as {{user}} user via password
windows_password_warning: Please proceed to the console to set up a password
resize_popup_text: Check if files have been successfully migrated to the new instance disk. Choose Confirm resize from the instance menu to confirm migration was successful, otherwise choose Revert resize to revert back to the initial disk.

text.stop: Are you sure you want to stop instance {{name}}?
text.start: Are you sure you want to start instance {{name}}?
text.reboot: Are you sure you want to reboot instance {{name}}?
text.resize_confirm: Are you sure you want to resize instance {{name}}?
text.resize_rollback: Are you sure you want to revert instance {{name}}?
text.unrescue: Are you sure you want to unrescue instance {{name}}?
text.unmount: Are you sure you want to unmount instance {{name}}?

warning.rebuild: The system will be reinstalled. All data currently on the instance disk will be permanently deleted.
warning.stop: Please note: When the server is stopped, the usage fee continues to be deducted from the balance, as your server remains assigned resources. The charges will only stop when the server is deleted.

os_description.shr: Here are images uploaded by technical support staff for you
os_description.pub: Here are publicly available images of various systems
os_description.image: Here are publicly available images of various systems

private_warn_message: Private key. You should save this key locally, it will not be saved on server.

hint_description.period: Payment for the service is debited from the balance in your personal account immediately 24 hours in advance, regardless of the time of order. Money for hours unused on the day of the order is returned to the balance if the server has not been deleted before 08:30 GMT+2 the next day. Otherwise, recalculation and refund will not occur. Unused hours on the day of removal are non-refundable
hint_description.ip: Your provider should support IPv6 functionality

exlude_vat_hint: VAT - Value Added Tax for EU countries
insufficient_funds: Insufficient balance. Total price including VAT is {{price}} euros. Please <button>top up</button> your balance and try again.
resize_explanation: The upgrade cost is the difference between the cost of the current and new tariff.
windows_os_notice: Please note: Windows-based servers only include a trial license type. To obtain a license for Microsoft Windows products, please contact the vendors
metrics_chart_empty: No data available to generate the chart
name: Name

snapshots.create_warning: Instance will not be available while the snapshot is being processed.
snapshots.limit_value: You can create 5 snapshots per day.
snapshots.limit_reached: You have reached the creation limit for today.

backups.create_warning: Instance will not be available while the backup is being processed.

description.image_name: Set a display name that will reflect what the image contains, like its operating system or snapshot of an instance.
description.min_disk: This property will tell OpenStack Compute what the minimum required disk size is for this image. This allows you to set a limit in order to avoid potential problems while creating an Instance with a lower disk size than the installed software on that image.
description.min_ram: Minimum required RAM (GB)Like the minimum required disk size, this option allows you to set a limit for the minimum required RAM an instance created from this image will required in order to run properly.
description.os: These special attributes allows Zomro to show the distro icon next to each instance created from this image and allows OpenStack to properly create an Instance especially for Windows or other non Linux distributions.

protected.image: Set this option in order to protect the image from accidental deletion.
protected.snapshot: Set this option in order to protect the snapshot from accidental deletion.
protected.backup: Set this option in order to protect the backup from accidental deletion.

new_access_method_warning: Setting a new access method may not work for modified images.
delete_image_text: Are you sure you want to delete image "{{name}}"?
sold_out_messsage: Unfortunately, this plan is currently sold out!
sold_out_description: You can buy it now and your server will be activated as soon as we have resources. Usually it takes no more than 3 days. You will receive a notification about the activation of the service using the method selected in profile settings. Tariffing for the service will begin from the moment the server is activated, and the funds written off for the purchase will be counted towards payment for the first day of use.
move_the_image:
Do you need a server in another DC?
Copy the image to the DC in which you want to create a server.
no_tariffs_for_launch: No tariffs match the current image's minimum required parameters. Check the values of the minimum disk size and minimum RAM parameters set into the image details and adjust them if necessary
